mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PAC PA JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (PA.OI_NO=OI.OI_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_ORD O ON (O.ORD_NO=OI.ORD_NO) WHERE O.ORD_PRC_ORD IS NULL
SELECT SUM(PA.PAC_URLS) FROM TB_PAC PA JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (PA.OI_NO=OI.OI_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_ORD O ON (O.ORD_NO=OI.ORD_NO) WHERE O.ORD_PRC_ORD IS NULL
